Version 2.0.90 - Fix Position Bar Counter

Bug Fixes

  • Fix position bar counter stuck for iSpring and Rise 360: replace parseInt with parseSlideNumber to handle text-format locations like "slide_3" and "section_1"
  • Fix Captivate position bar stuck for first 10s: add isApiWrite parameter to sendProgressUpdate so SCORM API writes bypass the v2.0.87 stale-poller suppress logic
  • Pass isApiWrite=true for all SCORM API write paths (step 6A lesson_location, 6C score.raw, 6D suspend_data) in both SCORM 1.2 and 2004

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.89: Refactor SCORM logs: remove ~300 verbose logs, add 12 targeted position-tracking logs
  • v2.0.88: Fix stale localStorage causing wrong position counter
  • v2.0.87: Enforce 8-flow behavior for all SCORM vendors; fix tag navigation progress inflation and resume position bar drop
  • v2.0.86: Always set defineProperty traps; compute furthestSlide in trap; reduce vendor delays
